works.description:
Dear Sir,

The site: wiky-learning.blogspot.in is copying full blog post one-by-one  

(not only mine but I have seen few other blogs posts too). I already  
applied earlier and 2 posts were takedown.

Hence, I am requesting you to kindly take steps against the site and help 

the original authors to keep their original post unique.

Thanks & Regards,
Kunal Chowdhury
Microsoft MVP (www.kunal-chowdhury.com)
